Description: Dreamlike and strange — bend reality and logic to explore the subconscious and symbolic.
Non-representational. Focus on shape, color, and form to express ideas beyond realism.
Stripped down to essentials. Emphasize simplicity, negative space, and quiet focus.
Soft, emotional, and passionate. Center beauty, love, and idealism.

Explosive and wild. Let disorder and motion drive the composition.

Playful and imaginative. Lean into fantasy, humor, or charm.
